name: Bento Boss
description:
A lunch made with love is a thing of beauty. Bento Boss is a food dress up game for bento enthusiasts and the foodie curious. Chill out and craft delicious boxed lunches to relaxing tunes. Then send friends your beautiful creations that look good enough to eat. How many mouthwatering combinations can you pack into your bento box?

Directions

Click food options in the menu to make them appear. Click and drag the food with your mouse, and rotate it with your WASD keys. Serve and enjoy!
